Articles.Content: I didn\'t know there was a 2nd space port hidden on Kerbin.. Can someone tell me what heading i should orbit at so i pass over it? Post it in a spoiler tag just in case others don\'t want to know.
I don\'t have an exact heading, but from memory the purple markers on the navball point straight to the second KSC, instead of the one you launch from as they are supposed to due to a minor bug.
Ahh, i always wondered what the purple marker was for lol, thanks. i\'ll see if i can find it lol

Shoot over the mountains west of the inland lake on the continent west of the KSCD continent. Look in craters.

If you still don\'t see it I\'ll post a screenshot of the map later.

can i have coordinates and screenshot

In the current version there is a bug where the KSC marker on the navball points to the second KSC instead.

(That hasn\'t been fixed, right? I didn\'t miss an update?)
i died half an hour into of roving to the purple dot. past the mountain range and nothing

It\'s confusing because as you approach, the purple marker is actually pointing down and not just at a compass heading. You probably flew right over it, since you can\'t see the buildings until you\'re quite close. If you really want to know where it is, my car 'ancillary' is parked there in this screenshot:

***Can\'t spoiler an attachment: Don\'t look if you don\'t want to know!***
